attributes.action: Cancel GCSE and A-Level exams for 2022
attributes.additional_details: Cancel the 2022 GCSE and A-Level exams
attributes.background:
Students have been disadvantaged in many different ways, and it would not be fair to allow 2022 exams to go ahead.

Due to the Coronavirus outbreak, students have had to teach themselves during multiple lockdowns.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
